sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
The French King's appeal from the proceedings of the Pope to a general council, September 28, 1688 faithfully translated from the French copy printed at Paris. Louis XIV, King of France, 1638-1715. France. Parlement (Paris). Chambre des vacations.
11 p.
Printed for Richard Baldwin, London : 1688.
Extract of Louis's appeal to Parliament, made to prevent retaliation by the Pope after Louis had expressed his grievances against him in a letter to Cardinal d'Estrées. Translation of an unidentified work in French. Caption title: Act of appeal made to the Future Council by the King's attorney general : and judgment given thereupon, by the Chamber of Vacation, the 27th of September, 1688. Notarized by: Moussinot, Senior, & Battelier. Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
=======
The French King's appeal from the proceedings of the Pope to a general council, September 28, 1688 faithfully translated from the French copy printed at Paris. Louis XIV, King of France, 1638-1715. France. Parlement (Paris). Chambre des vacations.
11 p.
Printed for Richard Baldwin, London : 1688.
Extract of Louis's appeal to Parliament, made to prevent retaliation by the Pope after Louis had expressed his grievances against him in a letter to Cardinal d'Estrées. Translation of an unidentified work in French. Caption title: Act of appeal made to the Future Council by the King's attorney general : and judgment given thereupon, by the Chamber of Vacation, the 27th of September, 1688. Notarized by: Moussinot, Senior, & Battelier. Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
Richard Baldwin
